vsim.utils

Class Message

  • java.lang.Object
    • vsim.utils.Message

  • public final class Message
extends java.lang.Object
    The Message class contains useful methods for printing to stdout and stderr with a predefined format.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void error(java.lang.String msg)
      This method prints to stderr an error message with the format "vsim: (error) msg".
      static void errors()
      This method prints to stderr the errors in Globals.errors (if any), then prints the number of errors and exit with a status code of 1.
      static void log(java.lang.String msg)
      This method prints to stdout a log message with the format "vsim: msg".
      static void panic(java.lang.String msg)
      This method prints to stderr an error message with the format "vsim: (error) msg" and then exits with a status code of 1.
      static void warning(java.lang.String msg)
      This method prints to stdout a warning message with the format "vsim: (warning) msg".

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      • errors

        public static void errors()
        This method prints to stderr the errors in Globals.errors (if any), then prints the number of errors and exit with a status code of 1.
